com.scvngr.levelup.core.util

Class ContextInstrumenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.util.ContextInstrumenter

  • public final class ContextInstrumenter
extends Object
    An instrumenter of Contexts for test purposes. Activity classes may pass the base context in ContextThemeWrapper.attachBaseContext(android.content.Context) to from(android.content.Context) to allow themselves to be instrumented. This technique supports instrumentation tests and unit tests.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ContextInstrumenter.Provider
      An provider of instrumented Contexts.

      • from

        public static Context from(Context context)
        Parameters:
        context - the Context to instrument.
        Returns:
        the instrumented Context or context itself if a ContextInstrumenter.Provider is not configured.
